message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we say $110 for the product?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $100?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to compromise a bit further. How about we say $105 for the product?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $98?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $99, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out. Is that something you'd be comfortable with?
I'm close to accepting, but I'm still trying to squeeze out a bit more savings. Would you be willing to go down to $97?
I'm not comfortable going any lower than $98, Bob. I think that's the best I can do. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
